mods.abstract: Runaway, FROM the undersigned at Opelousas, on the 30th May last, a negroman named John, aged about 28 years, about 5 feet 6 inches high, strong built, speaking french and English. It is supposed that he has taken with him a small american bai horse aged about 7 year, having fresh collar marks on both shoulders, not branded. A liberal reward will be given to whomsoever shall bring said boy to the undersigned or lodge him in one of the Jails of this State. NOEL LARCADE. Opelousas, June 2nd, 1860.
